XXvamvuppu:1: adhigataparamārthaḥ śrīghanavyūha eva prati tuṣitajanārthaṃ yo 'bhavac chvetaketuḥ /
XXvamvuppu:2: tata iha jagadarthaṃ cābhavac chākyaketuḥ sa jayatu jitamṛtyur darśitānantamāyaḥ // VMv_1.1 //
XXvamvuppu:6: sāriṣṭaṃ vañcanaṃ mṛtyor ucyate śāstrasaṃgatam // VMv_1.3 //
XXvamvuppu:7: sarvathā vañcanaṃ mṛtyor muktānām eva yujyate /
XXvamvuppu:10: upāyair jīvitaṃ dīrghaṃ mṛtyuvañcanam ucyate // VMv_1.5 //
XXvamvuppu:13: na vinā jīvitāt sāraṃ saṃsāre kiṃ cid īkṣyate /
XXvamvuppu:14: nānopāyair atas tūrṇaṃ mṛtyuvañcanam ārabhet // VMv_1.7 //
XXvamvuppu:15: na duṣkaraṃ yataḥ kiṃ cid upāyair yuktiyojitaiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:17: lakṣaṇād dūrato mṛtyuṃ jñātvā yuktā pratikriyā /
XXvamvuppu:18: maste patati vajrāgnau suprajño 'pi karoti kim // VMv_1.9 //
XXvamvuppu:20: kathyate jñāyate yena maraṇaṃ bhāvi tatparaiḥ // VMv_1.10 //
XXvamvuppu:21: mṛtyor lakṣaṇam ājñātuṃ vāñchā cet kasya cid bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:36: kramaśo 'pi na sarveṣām api tv ekādisaṃkhyayā // VMv_1.18 //
XXvamvuppu:37: adṛṣṭvā lakṣaṇaṃ yatra mṛtyur dṛṣṭaḥ kva cid bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:38: niścetur dūṣaṇaṃ tatra na tu lakṣaṇanāstitā // VMv_1.19 //
XXvamvuppu:39: dṛṣṭvāpi lakṣaṇaṃ yatra na mṛtyur dṛśyate kva cit /
XXvamvuppu:41: niścite dūrato mṛtyau prasiddhir mahatī bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:42: yathāśakti parityāge pratīkāre ca vartanam // VMv_1.21 //
XXvamvuppu:44: bāhyāni prathamaṃ tāval lakṣaṇāny upalakṣayet // VMv_1.22 //
XXvamvuppu:46: niyato 'niyataś ceti vijñeyaḥ sa tu yatnataḥ // VMv_1.23 //
XXvamvuppu:48: kālo niyata ity ukto 'niyatas tu viparyayāt // VMv_1.24 //
XXvamvuppu:50: vātaśītādisaṅgāc ca lakṣaṇīyam ataḥ pṛthak // VMv_1.25 //
XXvamvuppu:51: karkaṭo rāśir āṣāḍhaḥ puṣyas tu makaro mataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:52: karkaṭe makare cāpi jāyate mṛtyulakṣaṇam // VMv_1.26 //
XXvamvuppu:56: vyabhre nabhasi madhyāhne cchāyāyāś ca nirīkṣaṇam // VMv_1.28 //
XXvamvuppu:61: āṣāḍhāt kramaśo vṛddhiḥ puṣyād dhrāsaḥ kramāt tathā /
XXvamvuppu:62: chāyāvikāram ālocya māsān maraṇam ādiśet // VMv_1.31 //
XXvamvuppu:63: kṣayakāle bhaved vṛddhir vṛddhikāle kṣayo yadi /
XXvamvuppu:64: tam eva kālam ārabhya mṛtyur māsād viniścitaḥ // VMv_1.32 //
XXvamvuppu:66: kṣayakāle 'py atikṣaye mṛtyur eva na saṃśayaḥ // VMv_1.33 //
XXvamvuppu:68: yāni ṣaṭ ṣaḍ dināny atra kālākālanirūpaṇam // VMv_1.34 //
XXvamvuppu:71: pādayos tālukāṃ viddhvā nābhau vedho yadā bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:72: ahorātratrayād ūrdhvaṃ pañcatvaṃ jāyate tadā // VMv_1.36 //
XXvamvuppu:73: pādayos tālukāṃ viddhvā yadi cakṣuś ca vidhyati /
XXvamvuppu:74: tadā māsatrayād ūrdhvaṃ gamanaṃ yamasadmani // VMv_1.37 //
XXvamvuppu:75: pādayos tālukāṃ viddhvā nāsikāṃ yadi vidhyati /
XXvamvuppu:76: tribhir dinais tadā nūnam ekākī yāti pañcatām // VMv_1.38 //
XXvamvuppu:77: kuṭiprasrāvayoḥ kāle tulyaṃ syād yadi hañchikā /
XXvamvuppu:78: tasyām eva hi velāyāṃ mṛtyur varṣeṇa tasya hi // VMv_1.39 //
XXvamvuppu:80: jihvāgrādarśane mṛtyur vāsaraiḥ syāt tribhir nṛṇām // VMv_1.40 //
XXvamvuppu:81: māsaiś caturbhir mṛtyuḥ syāt karṇāgre tīkṣṇavedhanāt /
XXvamvuppu:82: sadyo mṛtyur bhaven nūnam ūrṇāsthāne pravedhanāt // VMv_1.41 //
XXvamvuppu:84: tadā māsād bhaven mṛtyuḥ puṇyam evārjayet tataḥ // VMv_1.42 //
XXvamvuppu:86: syāc cet tulyaṃ tadā māsaiḥ pañcatvaṃ yāti pañcabhiḥ // VMv_1.43 //
XXvamvuppu:87: hastayoḥ pādayoś caiva kaniṣṭhānāṃ ca saṃdhayaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:88: catvāro yasya vidhyanti tulyaṃ māsāt sa mṛtyubhāk // VMv_1.44 //
XXvamvuppu:90: pakṣatrayeṇa mṛtyuḥ syād yadi dharmaṃ na sevate // VMv_1.45 //
XXvamvuppu:91: tulyakālaṃ yadā vidhyet tālukānāṃ trayaṃ muhuḥ /
XXvamvuppu:92: tribhir dinais tadā mṛtyur yadi śakrasamo bhavet // VMv_1.46 //
XXvamvuppu:94: saptāhān mriyate nūnaṃ yadi na syāt pratikriyā // VMv_1.47 //
XXvamvuppu:95: maithune sati ghaṇṭāyā nādaś cet karṇayor bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:96: tribhir māsais tadā mṛtyur yadi brahmasamo bhavet // VMv_1.48 //
XXvamvuppu:97: kṛṣṇaṃ yadi bhavec chukraṃ śuklāyāṃ pratipattithau /
XXvamvuppu:98: ṣaḍbhir māsais tadā mṛtyur lohitaṃ vyādhisūcakam // VMv_1.49 //
XXvamvuppu:100: yadi vedho 'pratīkāro mṛtyuḥ sadyas tadā bhavet // VMv_1.50 //
XXvamvuppu:102: vedhaḥ sadāho yasyāsau ṣaḍmāsān mriyate dhruvam // VMv_1.51 //
XXvamvuppu:104: māsatrayāt pakṣatrayān mṛtyur ekadināt kramāt // VMv_1.52 //
XXvamvuppu:107: cakṣurnāsikayor madhye spandanaṃ cen na dṛśyate /
XXvamvuppu:108: jñātvā pañcadinān mṛtyum ādadyād dharmasaṃvalam // VMv_1.54 //
XXvamvuppu:109: netrayos tārake mliṣṭe sahasā bhavato yadi /
XXvamvuppu:110: ṣaḍmāsābhyantare mṛtyuḥ pratikārakriyā na cet // VMv_1.55 //
XXvamvuppu:111: akasmān nāsikā vakrā karṇau bhraṣṭau svadeśataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:112: netre ca vartulībhūte saptāhān mṛtyudarśanāt // VMv_1.56 //
XXvamvuppu:113: akasmād dhṛdayaṃ nimnaṃ syāc cet pakṣāt tadā mṛtiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:114: grīvāpārśvasthayor nāḍyor vicchedād api pakṣataḥ // VMv_1.57 //
XXvamvuppu:115: akasmāt kṛṣṇarekhā syāj jihvāyā yadi madhyataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:116: dṛḍho vā dantasaṃdaṃśas tadā mṛtyur dvirātrataḥ // VMv_1.58 //
XXvamvuppu:118: tasminn eva dine mṛtyur athavā pañcavāsaraiḥ // VMv_1.59 //
XXvamvuppu:120: ṣaḍbhir māsais tadā mṛtyur yadi mantrādi nācaret // VMv_1.60 //
XXvamvuppu:121: akasmāj jāyate sthūlaḥ kṛśaḥ kruddho bhayākulaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:122: yas tasya mṛtyur varṣeṇa yadi dharmaṃ na sevate // VMv_1.61 //
XXvamvuppu:123: indriyāṇi na gṛhṇanti yathāsvaṃ yasya gocarān /
XXvamvuppu:124: muhuḥ skhalati vāṇī ca muhuś ca mativibhramaḥ // VMv_1.62 //
XXvamvuppu:126: darpaṇe salile vāpi svacchāyāṃ yo na paśyati // VMv_1.63 //
XXvamvuppu:128: ameghe vidyutaṃ paśyet sphurantīṃ dakṣiṇāśritām // VMv_1.64 //
XXvamvuppu:129: divā chāyāpathaṃ paśyed ulkāyāḥ patanaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:132: gandharvanagaraṃ paśyed vṛkṣāgre śikhare gireḥ // VMv_1.66 //
XXvamvuppu:133: paśyet pretapiśācān adṛśyān anyāṃś ca bhīṣaṇān /
XXvamvuppu:134: prakampate bhṛśaṃ caiva mūrchito vā bhaven muhuḥ // VMv_1.67 //
XXvamvuppu:136: paśyed ekaikaśas tasya mṛtyur māsāvadher bhavet // VMv_1.68 //
XXvamvuppu:138: yaḥ paśyet tasya mṛtyuḥ syāt ṣaḍmāsābhyantare dhruvam // VMv_1.69 //
XXvamvuppu:140: śuṣyanty abhīkṣṇaṃ ṣaḍmāsān maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet // VMv_1.70 //
XXvamvuppu:142: saptāhamṛtyor jāyeta jvālā vākasmikī tanau // VMv_1.71 //
XXvamvuppu:143: arundhatīṃ rohiṇīṃ ca dhruvaṃ chāyāpathaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:144: rātrāv apaśyato 'kasmāt ṣaḍmāsān mṛtyum ādiśet // VMv_1.72 //
XXvamvuppu:146: saraśmikaṃ citrabhānuṃ candraṃ cāpi saraśmikam // VMv_1.73 //
XXvamvuppu:147: rātrau sūryaṃ divā candraṃ svanetre jvalanaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:148: tārāṃ merupramāṇāṃ ca samudraṃ ca nadīm iva // VMv_1.74 //
XXvamvuppu:149: nābhau hikkāṃ gude hañchāṃ varṇaṃ padmopamaṃ mukhe /
XXvamvuppu:150: galake piṭakān raktān gātre varṇavicitratām // VMv_1.75 //
XXvamvuppu:151: hṛdaye krandanaṃ sāśru prakampam atha tāluni /
XXvamvuppu:154: ātmanaiva hi yaḥ paśyet paśyen mṛtyuṃ sa pakṣataḥ // VMv_1.77 //
XXvamvuppu:156: varṣān mṛtyur bhavet tatra bhaiṣajyādi pratikriyā // VMv_1.78 //
XXvamvuppu:157: ardhaṃ śītaṃ tathā coṣṇam ardhaṃ yasya kalevaram /
XXvamvuppu:158: saptarātrād bhaven mṛtyuḥ paralokaṃ vicintayet // VMv_1.79 //
XXvamvuppu:163: yasya mastakam āruhya trivarṇo yāti vegataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:164: kṛkalāso mṛtis tasya pañcamāsād viniścitā // VMv_1.82 //
XXvamvuppu:165: śabdo na śrūyate dehād dhastābhyām apamārjitāt /
XXvamvuppu:169: kardame pāṃśudeśe vā purataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'pi vā /
XXvamvuppu:170: khaṇḍaṃ pādodaye nyūnaṃ mṛtyur māsacatuṣṭayāt // VMv_1.85 //
XXvamvuppu:172: varṣatrayātyayān mṛtyur yadi bhrāntyā na kalpitaḥ // VMv_1.86 //
XXvamvuppu:176: pratyahaṃ phūtkṛtaṃ kurvan kramāt tanmadhyasaṃsthitam // VMv_1.88 //
XXvamvuppu:177: paśyed indradhanuś citraṃ dīrghāyuḥ puruṣaḥ sadā /
XXvamvuppu:178: ṣaḍmāsāyur na tat paśyed iti karmavicitratā // VMv_1.89 //
XXvamvuppu:183: nāgān anekaśaḥ paśyet saṃyatān iva saṃtatam /
XXvamvuppu:184: teṣām adṛṣṭau ṣaḍmāsān maraṇaṃ parikīrtitam // VMv_1.92 //
XXvamvuppu:185: prabhāte vātha sāyāhne jyotsnāyāṃ vā ciraṃ puraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:186: vitatya bāhū svacchāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā paśyec chanair nabhaḥ // VMv_1.93 //
XXvamvuppu:188: śiraso 'darśanāt tasya mṛtyuḥ syād varṣamadhyataḥ // VMv_1.94 //
XXvamvuppu:191: jānūpari sthitau bāhū kṛtvā mūrdhni tathāñjalim /
XXvamvuppu:192: rambhāphalanibhāṃ chāyāṃ lakṣayen madhyatas tayoḥ // VMv_1.96 //
XXvamvuppu:193: yadā tv ekaṃ dalaṃ tatra vikāsi parilakṣyate /
XXvamvuppu:194: tasyām eva tithau nūnaṃ ṣaḍmāsān maraṇaṃ bhavet // VMv_1.97 //
XXvamvuppu:196: śrotre śirasi netre ca śabdo dhūmo dyutis tathā // VMv_1.98 //
XXvamvuppu:197: karṇau pidhāya sudṛḍhaṃ gambhīro gulgulo dhvaniḥ /
XXvamvuppu:198: na śrūyate pañcadinaṃ daśa pañcadaśāthavā // VMv_1.99 //
XXvamvuppu:199: viṃśatiṃ divasān yāvat pañcaviṃśatim eva vā /
XXvamvuppu:201: eṣām apy antarāleṣu śodhyāḥ ṣoḍaśa vāsarāḥ /
XXvamvuppu:204: yo na paśyati tasya syān mṛtyur varṣatrayāvadheḥ // VMv_1.102 //
XXvamvuppu:208: etat sāmānyato jñeyaṃ viśeṣas tv ayam ucyate // VMv_1.104 //
XXvamvuppu:210: naṣṭe jyotiṣi mṛtyuḥ syāt ṣaṭtrinetrendumāsataḥ // VMv_1.105 //
XXvamvuppu:211: sūrye 'pi yadi candrasya kramaḥ syāt pūrvavat tadā /
XXvamvuppu:214: pañcamāsād bhaven mṛtyur nāsāgrasya vināśataḥ // VMv_1.107 //
XXvamvuppu:216: svasthendriyasya patane mṛtyur māsatrayād bhavet // VMv_1.108 //
XXvamvuppu:222: pārśvadvayasyākṛṣṭau tu mṛtyuḥ syād vāsaratrayāt // VMv_1.111 //
XXvamvuppu:226: yāvat pañcadinaṃ mṛtyuḥ pañcāśaddivasais tathā // VMv_1.113 //
XXvamvuppu:227: amlāditvaṃ ca rasato nīlāditvaṃ ca varṇataḥ /

XXvamvuppu:231: kṛṣṇe vā yadi vā śukle pakṣe reto 'tikṛṣṇakam /
XXvamvuppu:232: mṛtyuḥ ṣaḍmāsato no cet tenaiva syāt pratikriyā // VMv_1.116 //
XXvamvuppu:234: candre prabhañjane vāti praveśāt syāt pratikriyā // VMv_1.117 //
XXvamvuppu:236: caturmāsād bhaven mṛtyur ity āgamavicakṣaṇāḥ // VMv_1.118 //
XXvamvuppu:238: adyaiva mṛtyur asmākam iti paśyed anityatām // VMv_1.119 //
XXvamvuppu:240: svapno 'py asatyaḥ sarveṣāṃ nātaḥ śraddhā na yujyate // VMv_1.120 //
XXvamvuppu:242: sa svapne pratyayaṃ kṛtvā mṛtyuliṅgāni paśyatu // VMv_1.121 //
XXvamvuppu:244: yo 'bhirohati svapnānte sa syāt ṣaḍmāsamṛtyukaḥ // VMv_1.122 //
XXvamvuppu:246: vālukābhasmarāśiṃ vā maraṇaṃ tasya pūrvavat // VMv_1.123 //
XXvamvuppu:247: gardabhaṃ yaḥ samārūḍhaḥ prayāyād dakṣiṇāṃ diśam /
XXvamvuppu:248: bhūyaś ca na nivarteta tadvat tasyāpi jīvitam // VMv_1.124 //
XXvamvuppu:249: yaś cāpi vānarārūḍhaḥ prayāyād dakṣiṇāṃ diśam /
XXvamvuppu:250: tatrasthaś ca vibudhyeta mṛtyuḥ syāt tasya pūrvavat // VMv_1.125 //
XXvamvuppu:251: daṇḍaṃ vā caityayūpaṃ vā naro yas tv abhirohati /
XXvamvuppu:252: vālmīkaṃ pāṃśurāśiṃ vā ṣaḍmāsān na sa jīvati // VMv_1.126 //
XXvamvuppu:253: kālī kumārī saṃkruddhā yā tu badhnāti bandhanaiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:254: kālarātrī tu sā jñeyā saptāhān mṛtyukārikā // VMv_1.127 //
XXvamvuppu:255: kṛṣṇavastrā tu yā nārī kālī kāmayate naraṃ /
XXvamvuppu:256: karavīramālā svapne yāty asau yamamaṇḍalam // VMv_1.128 //
XXvamvuppu:257: tamo vā praviśet svapne śvabhraṃ vā cārakaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:258: vṛkṣād vā prapatet svapne sa mṛtyor antike sthitaḥ // VMv_1.129 //
XXvamvuppu:259: vṛkṣaṃ tṛṇaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vā viphalaṃ yas tu paśyati /
XXvamvuppu:260: suptaḥ śīrṣe śarīre vā ṣaḍmāsān na sa jīvati // VMv_1.130 //
XXvamvuppu:261: yo vānararathārūḍho gacchet pūrvāṃ diśaṃ naraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:262: pratibuddho vijānīyād rātrir eṣā mamāntimā // VMv_1.131 //
XXvamvuppu:268: prasuptenāgrato dṛṣṭvā trimāsān mṛtyur āpyate // VMv_1.134 //
XXvamvuppu:271: kharam āruhya vegena vrajantaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam /
XXvamvuppu:272: ātmānam īdṛśaṃ svapne paśyet ṣaḍmāsamṛtyukaḥ // VMv_1.136 //
XXvamvuppu:273: raktamālyāni gandhāṃś ca raktāmbaram athāpi vā /
XXvamvuppu:274: yaḥ svapne labhate tasya mṛtyuḥ syād aṣṭamāsataḥ // VMv_1.137 //
XXvamvuppu:276: ekavaktreṇa śaknoti vaktuṃ varṣaśatair api // VMv_1.138 //
XXvamvuppu:277: etāni mṛtyoḥ pratipādakāni liṅgāni bāhyāni yathoditāni /
XXvamvuppu:278: vijñāya tāni tvaritaṃ vidheyo mantrādibhir vañcana eva yatnaḥ // VMv_1.139 //
XXvamvuppu:280: idānīm āntaraṃ mṛtyor lakṣaṇaṃ kathyate sphuṭam /
XXvamvuppu:281: tac ca vāyūdayāj jñeyaṃ vāyur ghrāṇāsyagocaraḥ // VMv_2.1 //
XXvamvuppu:283: yāvad ādhyātmikaṃ samyag lakṣaṇaṃ naiva niścitam // VMv_2.2 //
XXvamvuppu:284: ubhayor niścayān mṛtyur niścitaḥ syāt parisphuṭam /
XXvamvuppu:285: bāhye buddhiviparyāso rogāder api saṃskṛteḥ // VMv_2.3 //
XXvamvuppu:289: tad ārabhya dinaṃ mṛtyur mitakālātyayād bhavet // VMv_2.5 //
XXvamvuppu:293: ato viparyayāt kalpyaṃ maraṇādi manīṣibhiḥ // VMv_2.7 //
XXvamvuppu:295: dināni trīṇi pavanaḥ tataḥ sūrye dinatrayam // VMv_2.8 //
XXvamvuppu:296: dinatrayaṃ punaś candre tataḥ sūrye dinatrayam /
XXvamvuppu:297: krameṇānena niyamād yāvat pañcadaśī sitā // VMv_2.9 //
XXvamvuppu:298: evaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ samārabhya sūrye vahati mārutaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:299: dināni trīṇi pūrvavad yāvat pañcadaśītarā // VMv_2.10 //
XXvamvuppu:301: ṣaḍbhir māsair bhaven mṛtyur dharmam eva smaret tataḥ // VMv_2.11 //
XXvamvuppu:305: vahed vāyur yadi tadā kalyudvegādi jāyate // VMv_2.13 //
XXvamvuppu:309: vahed yasya daśāhāni saṃkrāntau mriyate hi saḥ // VMv_2.15 //
XXvamvuppu:311: tasya nāśaṃ vijānīyād ahorātrān na saṃśayaḥ // VMv_2.16 //
XXvamvuppu:312: itaś cetaś ca bahudhā yasyārdhapraharaṃ vahet /
XXvamvuppu:313: vāyus tasya vijānīyāt pūjanaṃ lābham eva ca // VMv_2.17 //
XXvamvuppu:315: vāyus tasyārthanāśaḥ syād udvego vā bhayādi vā // VMv_2.18 //
XXvamvuppu:317: samatītya vahed yasya tasya rogādi jāyate // VMv_2.19 //
XXvamvuppu:319: tad ahar jīvitaṃ tasya yadi vajrasamo 'py asau // VMv_2.20 //
XXvamvuppu:321: pañcāhaṃ ced vahet sūrye mṛtyur aṣṭādaśābdataḥ // VMv_2.21 //
XXvamvuppu:323: pañcāhaṃ ced vahen mṛtyur bhavet pañcadaśābdataḥ // VMv_2.22 //
XXvamvuppu:325: jyeṣṭhe 'pi ced bhaved evaṃ mṛtyuḥ syān navavarṣataḥ // VMv_2.23 //
XXvamvuppu:327: pañcāhaṃ māruto mṛtyuḥ ṣaḍbhir varṣais tadā bhavet // VMv_2.24 //
XXvamvuppu:328: māghamāsasya saṃkrānteḥ pañcāhaṃ ced vahen marut /
XXvamvuppu:330: sarvatra dvitricaturo vāyuś ced divasān vahet /
XXvamvuppu:331: abdabhāgais tu te śodhyā yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ // VMv_2.26 //
XXvamvuppu:332: evam eva vahec candre vāyuś cen mṛtyuvarjitāḥ /

XXvamvuppu:339: samasapta iti khyātas tatrārkaḥ samasaptagaḥ // VMv_2.30 //
XXvamvuppu:340: rāśau tatraiva candraś cej janmanakṣatrago bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:341: pauṣṇaḥ kālaḥ sa vijñeyas tatra mṛtyor nirūpaṇam // VMv_2.31 //
XXvamvuppu:343: kālaṃ nirūpayed vidvān itaratra vikālakam // VMv_2.32 //
XXvamvuppu:344: yatra velākṣaṇe vāyor gatir anyā pravartate /
XXvamvuppu:345: tatra velākṣaṇe pūrṇe mṛtyur nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ // VMv_2.33 //
XXvamvuppu:346: pauṣṇe kāle vahed vāyur dinārdhaṃ yadi sūryagaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:347: vatsarair manusaṃkhyātair lakṣayen maraṇaṃ tadā // VMv_2.34 //
XXvamvuppu:349: vahec ced arkadikśailaṣaḍvedābdaiḥ kramān mṛtiḥ // VMv_2.35 //
XXvamvuppu:350: pañcāhaṃ ca daśāhaṃ ca tathā pañcadaśāhakam /

XXvamvuppu:352: tathaiva ced vahed vāyur viṃśatiṃ pañcaviṃśatim /
XXvamvuppu:353: ṣaḍbhir māsais tribhiś caiva yathāsaṃkhyaṃ bhaven mṛtiḥ // VMv_2.37 //
XXvamvuppu:355: syād dvyekamāsaiḥ pakṣeṇa digdinaiś ca kramān mṛtiḥ // VMv_2.38 //
XXvamvuppu:356: triṃśat tu caikatriṃśac ca dvātriṃśad divasān yadi /
XXvamvuppu:357: pañcatridvidinair mṛtyur yathāsaṃkhyaṃ bhavet tadā // VMv_2.39 //
XXvamvuppu:358: trayastriṃśaddinaṃ yāvat sūrye ced vāti mārutaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:359: tasminn eva dine mṛtyur viṣṇor api na saṃśayaḥ // VMv_2.40 //
XXvamvuppu:361: noktāḥ ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyā ye teṣāṃ śodhanam ucyate // VMv_2.41 //
XXvamvuppu:363: saptāhaṃ cet tribhir varṣaiḥ pūrvoktadviguṇonitaiḥ // VMv_2.42 //
XXvamvuppu:365: navāhaṃ cet tribhir varṣaiḥ ṣaṇṇavatidinonitaiḥ // VMv_2.43 //
XXvamvuppu:381: vāyūdayavaśāj jñeyo nāta ūrdhvam asaṃbhavāt // VMv_2.51 //
XXvamvuppu:383: ādau kṛtvā dinārdhaṃ sakaladinam athā-harniśaṃ yāvad eva tasmād ahnor dvayaṃ ca tridinam atha catur-vāsarān vyāpya yāvat /
XXvamvuppu:384: prāṇo nāḍyāśrito yo vahati dinapater udgame savyahīne tasmin vijñeyam etad bhuvanaravidiśo maṅgalaṃ ṣaṭ catuṣkam // VMv_2.52 //
XXvamvuppu:385: pañcabhyaḥ pañcaviṃśaddivasagatir ihā-rohate pañcavṛddhyā tasmād ekottareṇa triguṇitadaśakaṃ tryuttaraṃ yāvad eva /
XXvamvuppu:386: kāle pauṣṇe samās tās trinayanaśaśinaḥ ṣaṭtriyugmendavo ye māsās te 'hāni śeṣās tithidigiṣuguṇa-dvīndavo jīvitasya // VMv_2.53 //
XXvamvuppu:388: āyuṣaḥ prāṇavāyoś ca dināny aṅkakramāl likhet // VMv_2.54 //
XXvamvuppu:389: ity āntarāṇy api mayā kathitāni mṛtyor liṅgāny ariṣṭam iti cāparanāmakāni /

XXvamvuppu:393: bāhyaś cādhyātmikaś cāpi jñeyo vañcanasaṃcayaḥ // VMv_3.1 //
XXvamvuppu:397: śraddhām ato dṛḍhīkuryād anyathā syāc chramaḥ paraḥ // VMv_3.3 //
XXvamvuppu:398: kāyakleśair bahuvidhair na cāpy arthasya rāśibhiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:399: dharmaḥ saṃprāpyate sūkṣmaḥ śraddhāhīnaiḥ surair api // VMv_3.4 //
XXvamvuppu:400: śraddhā dharmaḥ paraṃ sūkṣmaḥ śraddhā jñānaṃ tapo hutam /
XXvamvuppu:401: śraddhā svargaś ca mokṣaś ca śraddhā sarvam idaṃ jagat // VMv_3.5 //
XXvamvuppu:402: sarvasvaṃ jīvitaṃ cāpi dadyād aśraddhayā yadi /
XXvamvuppu:403: naivāpnuyāt phalaṃ kiṃ cic chraddadhānas tato bhavet // VMv_3.6 //
XXvamvuppu:405: dharmo hi trāyate mṛtyor mṛtyur dharmeṇa vañcyate // VMv_3.7 //
XXvamvuppu:407: brahmāpi hi vinā dharmaṃ na prabhur mṛtyuvañcane // VMv_3.8 //
XXvamvuppu:408: viduṣāṃ saṃmato dharmaḥ satyaṃ dānaṃ tapaḥ kṣamā /
XXvamvuppu:409: viśeṣeṇa kṛpā yeṣāṃ kiṃ teṣāṃ dharmavistaraiḥ // VMv_3.9 //
XXvamvuppu:411: teṣāṃ jñānaṃ ca mokṣaś ca kim anyair dharmavistaraiḥ // VMv_3.10 //
XXvamvuppu:413: tām evābhyasyato nityaṃ mṛtyur dūrāyate kramāt // VMv_3.11 //
XXvamvuppu:414: alpāyur api dīrghāyuḥ sadyaḥ syāj jīvayann imān /
XXvamvuppu:416: dīrghāyur api mandāyuḥ sadyaḥ syān mārayann imān /
XXvamvuppu:421: trāyamāṇo bhaven nūnaṃ dīrghāyur mṛtyuvañcakaḥ // VMv_3.15 //
XXvamvuppu:427: darśanād vandanān nityam āyuṣo vṛddhir āpyate // VMv_3.18 //
XXvamvuppu:435: caityādivandanāc caiva dhruvam āyur vivardhate // VMv_3.22 //
XXvamvuppu:438: satkṛtya vācayed bhikṣūn svayaṃ vā saṃpravartayet /
XXvamvuppu:439: dīrgham āyus tathā prāpya mṛtyor bhavati vañcakaḥ // VMv_3.24 //
XXvamvuppu:441: ekāgro vācayen nityaṃ mṛtyuvañcanam aśnute // VMv_3.25 //
XXvamvuppu:445: dhāraṇījapataś cāpi vañcyate mṛtyur udyataiḥ // VMv_3.27 //
XXvamvuppu:449: āsannam api dūrasthaṃ mṛtyuṃ kurvanti paṇḍitāḥ // VMv_3.29 //
XXvamvuppu:455: puṇyāt syād āyuṣo vṛddhis tadvṛddher mṛtyuvañcanam // VMv_3.32 //
XXvamvuppu:456: ityādi leśato dharmaḥ sūcitas tasya vistaraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:457: svayam unnīya kartavyas taj jñātvā mṛtyuvañcakaiḥ // VMv_3.33 //
XXvamvuppu:461: mṛtyoḥ parājayo dṛṣṭaḥ siddhavidyādharair yathā // VMv_3.35 //
XXvamvuppu:465: dhārakaḥ sarvamṛtyūnāṃ vañcakaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ // VMv_3.37 //
XXvamvuppu:466: na cātra maṇisāmarthye saṃśayo yuktibhāg yataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:470: ākāram uccaret pūrvaṃ tato ro lig iti sphuṭam /
XXvamvuppu:474: uktvā vairocanaṃ pūrvaṃ paścāt tāre dvir uccaret /
XXvamvuppu:475: tuttāre dvis ture dviś ca svāhāntaṃ mṛtyuvañcanam // VMv_3.42 //
XXvamvuppu:480: oṃ ādau ruru tato 'taḥ sphurupadam ataḥ param /
XXvamvuppu:481: jvala tiṣṭha tathā siddhalocaneti padatrayam // VMv_3.45 //
XXvamvuppu:485: dhautaś ca nirjalaiḥ kṣīrair huto dūrvādināthavā // VMv_3.47 //
XXvamvuppu:491: mokṣo 'pi jāyate nūnaṃ kiṃ punar mṛtyuvañcanam // VMv_3.50 //
XXvamvuppu:492: namas traiyadhvikānāṃ prāk tathāgatānāṃ syāt tataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:497: buddhadharmate tataḥ syāt sara sara samabalā // VMv_3.53 //
XXvamvuppu:499: lakṣaṇe jvala jvalanasāgare syāt padaṃ tataḥ // VMv_3.54 //
XXvamvuppu:500: dattvā svāhāpadaṃ cānte bhaven mantraḥ śatākṣaraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:504: oṃ uktvā padaṃ vimale jaya vare 'nu cāmṛte /
XXvamvuppu:505: hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ tataḥ svāhāpadaṃ brūyād anantaram // VMv_3.57 //
XXvamvuppu:508: hūṃ hūṃ ruru cale svāhā mantro 'yaṃ mṛtyuvañcakaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:511: daśalakṣaṃ tato homaṃ kurvīta kusumaiḥ sitaiḥ // VMv_3.60 //
XXvamvuppu:514: oṃ ādau tata āṅkāraḥ syād īṅkāras tataḥ param /
XXvamvuppu:515: ūṃ oṃ mṛtyuñjaya oṃ syād ayaṃ mantro daśākṣaraḥ // VMv_3.62 //
XXvamvuppu:517: tair āyuḥ sādhitaṃ dīrghaṃ tad dīrghaṃ mṛtyuvañcanam // VMv_3.63 //
XXvamvuppu:518: mantrair yaiḥ śāntikarma taiḥ syād vṛddhir āyuṣaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:519: yaiḥ syād āyuṣo vṛddhis taiḥ syān mṛtyuvañcanam // VMv_3.64 //
XXvamvuppu:520: mantrāṇām api sāmarthye saṃśayo naiva yuktibhāk /
XXvamvuppu:521: acintyaṃ mantrasāmarthyaṃ yataḥ sarveṣu saṃmatam // VMv_3.65 //
XXvamvuppu:523: na tad vastvantaraṃ loke yan na mantraiḥ prasidhyati /
XXvamvuppu:527: ekākinīm athānyair vā bheṣajaiḥ sahitāṃ sadā /
XXvamvuppu:528: tataḥ sthiravapur bhūtvā mṛtyudvāraṃ na paśyati // VMv_3.68 //
XXvamvuppu:530: āyurvṛddhir jarārogakṣayān mṛtyuṃ na paśyati // VMv_3.69 //
XXvamvuppu:537: ūrdhvādhobhyāṃ saṃpuṭayogaṃ yaḥ satataṃ kurute hitayogam /
XXvamvuppu:538: tasya suruṣṭo 'py avihatatejāḥ kiñcitkārī no yamarājā // VMv_3.73 //
XXvamvuppu:539: mṛtasaṃjīvanam api kva cid dṛṣṭam upāyataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:542: sadyo yad vā mṛtasyaiva patitair dhātubindubhiḥ // VMv_3.75 //
XXvamvuppu:550: dhruvaṃ nivārayen mṛtyum api kalpādisaṃkhyayā // VMv_3.79 //
XXvamvuppu:557: iti vidhāya bahiṣkriyam ādarān maraṇavañcanam atra yathābalam /
XXvamvuppu:558: prabalamṛtyumahābhayaśaṅkayā kuruta saṃprati tat punar āntaram // VMv_3.83 //

XXvamvuppu:563: saṃsargarahite ramye parvatādau kva cit sthitaḥ // VMv_4.2 //
XXvamvuppu:579: vajrāṇāṃ ca namo vajrakrodhāyeti padaṃ vadet // VMv_4.10 //
XXvamvuppu:588: hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā mantro vighnanivāraṇaḥ // VMv_4.14 //
XXvamvuppu:590: pūrvavaj japahomābhyāṃ śaktir asyāpi tādṛśī // VMv_4.15 //
XXvamvuppu:592: hanadvayaṃ dahadvayaṃ garjagarja tathā punaḥ // VMv_4.16 //
XXvamvuppu:594: oṃ amṛta hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ mama rakṣāṃ kuru svāhā // VMv_4.17 //
XXvamvuppu:596: yathābhivāñchitaṃ yogaṃ dhyāyād ekam aharniśam // VMv_4.18 //
XXvamvuppu:600: dhyātvā vairocanaṃ śuklam āsaṃsāraṃ na mṛtyubhāk // VMv_4.20 //
XXvamvuppu:602: dṛḍhāhaṅkārato dhyātvā vajrakāyo bhaved dhruvam // VMv_4.21 //
XXvamvuppu:609: dhyātvā tasyāpi hṛdaye lokeśam aparaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:611: koṭisaṃkhyā bhaved yāvat tāvad dhyānam idaṃ smaret /
XXvamvuppu:613: dṛṣṭvā yogeśvaraṃ mṛtyur mriyate svayam eva hi /
XXvamvuppu:614: anye 'pi skandhajā doṣāḥ svayam āyanti nāśitām // VMv_4.27 //
XXvamvuppu:620: dhyātvāryatārāṃ hṛdaye tasyāś cakraṃ sitadyuti // VMv_4.30 //
XXvamvuppu:623: dhyāyād ekāgracittaḥ san ṣaḍ māsān dṛḍhaniścayaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:624: japec cākhinnacittaḥ san mantram enaṃ daśākṣaram // VMv_4.32 //
XXvamvuppu:625: oṅkāram ādito dattvā paścāt tāre prayojayet /
XXvamvuppu:626: tuttāre syāt ture paścāt svāhāntaḥ sārvakarmikaḥ // VMv_4.33 //
XXvamvuppu:628: apy akhaṇḍitaromāgraṃ mṛtyuṃ jayati mṛtyuvat // VMv_4.34 //
XXvamvuppu:634: anyā ca vāñchitā siddhiś cakrād asmāt prajāyate // VMv_4.37 //
XXvamvuppu:636: svavarṇaveṣamudrābhir dhyātvā mṛtyuṃ na paśyati // VMv_4.38 //
XXvamvuppu:648: sarvarogān vinirjitya mṛtyuṃ jayati mṛtyuvat // VMv_4.44 //
XXvamvuppu:650: dhyātvā candrakramān mṛtyuṃ kalpādīṃś ca vināśayet // VMv_4.45 //
XXvamvuppu:653: jihvāṃ tālugatāṃ kṛtvā dantair dantān asaṃspṛśan /
XXvamvuppu:657: tato mṛtyuṃ jayet sadyaḥ palitādīṃś ca nāśayet /
XXvamvuppu:664: amṛtaṃ jīvanopāyas tena mṛtyur na bādhate // VMv_4.52 //
XXvamvuppu:666: ekāgracitto vidhivad aśabdo japa ucyate // VMv_4.53 //
XXvamvuppu:668: bhraṣṭāyuḥ san naro 'vaśyaṃ pañca varṣāṇi jīvati // VMv_4.54 //
XXvamvuppu:671: sahasram ekaṃ satataṃ gaṇayet prātar utthitaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:673: nābhyāsarahitas tiṣṭhen muhūrtam api na svapet /
XXvamvuppu:676: anulomaparo yogī mṛtyuṃ jayati niścitam // VMv_4.58 //
XXvamvuppu:678: svabhāvas tv anulomaḥ syād vilomas tadviparyayāt // VMv_4.59 //
XXvamvuppu:682: nirodhanāt kumbhakaḥ syāt taj japakrama ucyate // VMv_4.61 //
XXvamvuppu:686: ṣaṭtriṃśanmātriko hīno madhyaḥ syād dviguṇas tathā // VMv_4.63 //
XXvamvuppu:687: jyeṣṭhas tu triguṇo jñeyaḥ kumbhakas tena jīyate /

XXvamvuppu:691: ṣaṭtriṃśan mātrā yāvat syus tāvad yā kumbhakakriyā /
XXvamvuppu:692: udghāto 'sau mato hīno madhyamo dviguṇas tataḥ // VMv_4.66 //
XXvamvuppu:694: sa eva jeyo yatnena mṛtyuvañcanavāñchayā // VMv_4.67 //
XXvamvuppu:698: tasya kalpasahasrāṇi mṛtyur nāyāti saṃnidhim // VMv_4.69 //
XXvamvuppu:704: ākāśam iva taṃ mṛtyuḥ paśyann api na paśyati // VMv_4.72 //
XXvamvuppu:705: saṃtyajya vāyum athavā tattvam eva sadācaret /

XXvamvuppu:708: tattvena jīyate puṃsāṃ siddhayaś cābhivāñchitāḥ // VMv_4.74 //
XXvamvuppu:710: tām evābhyasyato nityaṃ mṛtyur āyāti vañcanām // VMv_4.75 //
XXvamvuppu:714: na cintāṃ cintayec cintyām acintyāṃ naiva cintayet /
XXvamvuppu:715: cintyācintyāṃ na cintayet tataḥ prāpsyati śūnyatām // VMv_4.77 //
XXvamvuppu:716: na bhāvaṃ bhāvayed vidvān nāpy abhāvaṃ vibhāvayet /

XXvamvuppu:721: anyāṃś ca bahulān mārān saṃsāraṃ ca na paśyati // VMv_4.80 //
XXvamvuppu:726: vikalpaṃ hānayet tasmān nirvikalpamanā bhavet // VMv_4.82 //
XXvamvuppu:728: tat tat tu sphuṭatāṃ yāti kāmaśokādibuddhivat // VMv_4.83 //
XXvamvuppu:729: sulabhāni hi śāstrāṇi prayogās te sudurlabhāḥ /
XXvamvuppu:730: prayogajñeṣu lokeṣu prayogā naiva durlabhāḥ // VMv_4.84 //
XXvamvuppu:736: balāt syād āyuṣo vṛddhis tadvṛddheś cirajīvitam // VMv_4.87 //
XXvamvuppu:737: pratyakṣasiddhaṃ sarveṣāṃ yathā nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:740: punas tailādisaṃprāpteḥ kalpāntam api tiṣṭhati // VMv_4.89 //
XXvamvuppu:742: siddhopadeśasaṃprāpteḥ kalpāntaṃ kiṃ na tiṣṭhati // VMv_4.90 //
XXvamvuppu:744: tathā jīrṇasya dehasya saṃskāreṇa na kiṃ bhavet // VMv_4.91 //
XXvamvuppu:745: na duṣkaraṃ kiṃ cana vikrameṇa tasmād anikṣiptadhurā yatadhvam /
XXvamvuppu:746: nityapravṛttā vibhinatti kāle śilātalaṃ mṛdv api vāridhārā // VMv_4.92 //
XXvamvuppu:747: kāṣṭhād agnir jāyate mathyamānād bhūmis toyaṃ khanyamānā dadāti /
XXvamvuppu:748: sotsāhānāṃ nāsty asādhyaṃ narāṇāṃ nyāyārabdhāḥ sarvayatnāḥ phalanti // VMv_4.93 //
XXvamvuppu:749: subahūny api vijñāya vañcanāni mṛter iha /
XXvamvuppu:750: ananuṣṭhānād viṣṭhābhir liptvā śayyāṃ mṛtā vayam // VMv_4.94 //
XXvamvuppu:752: ananuṣṭhānadoṣeṇa dantān niṣkāśya te mṛtāḥ // VMv_4.95 //
XXvamvuppu:754: adya śvo vā kariṣyāma iti cintāparā mṛtāḥ // VMv_4.96 //
XXvamvuppu:755: idaṃ kartāsmi śvaḥ punar idam idaṃ cāsya parato vṛthā prāptāśvāso vimṛśati na lolāṃ bhavagatim /
XXvamvuppu:756: agatvā kāryāntaṃ viṣaya-salilāvartapatitā prajā mṛtyor vaktraṃ makara-mukhavan nauḥ praviśati // VMv_4.97 //
XXvamvuppu:757: iti nigaditam etad vañcanaṃ mṛtyuśatroḥ svaparasamayasiddhadhyānakarmaprasādhyam /
XXvamvuppu:758: aghṛṇamaraṇabhīter yatnataḥ saṃvidheyaṃ yata iha kamanīyaṃ jīvitān nānyad asti // VMv_4.98 //
XXvamvuppu:764: āptam ataḥ kuśalaṃ yad amṛtyus tena jano 'stu sa mṛtyuvimuktaḥ // VMv_4.101 //
XXvamvuppu:767: // iti śrīpaṇḍitācāryavāgīśvarakīrtiviracite mṛtyuvañcanopadeśe caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ //
